name: Connect 'em all!
description:
Puzzle game made for Mini Jam 65: Abandoned

Drag and fling pieces of matching colors at each other to connect them and fix all the broken shapes.

Controls:

Left click: Click and drag on a piece to aim. Release the button to fling it in the targeted direction.

R: Restart level

M: Mute/Unmute

ESC: Show main menu
